cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.23)
project(untitled4)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 14)

include_directories(C:\\Program\ Files\\MySQL\\MySQL\ Connector\ C\ 6.1\\include) #include folder location
link_directories(C:\\Program\ Files\\MySQL\\MySQL\ Connector\ C\ 6.1\\lib) #lib folder location
link_libraries(libmysql) #dll file name under lib

#It has nothing to do with this configuration, usually automatically generated by the project (note that it should be under the import folder)
add_executable(untitled4 main.cpp)

#Main configuration The first parameter is the project name
target_link_libraries(untitled4 libmysql)
